      • searchProduct

        public BibliographicProduct searchProduct​(java.lang.String productName)
        This Java function searches for a BibliographicProduct in an inventory by its name and returns it.
        Parameters:
        productName - a String representing the name of a product that needs to be searched in an inventory of BibliographicProducts. The method searches for a BibliographicProduct object in the inventory that has the same name as the productName parameter and returns it. If no such product is found, the method returns null.
        Returns:
        The method is returning a BibliographicProduct object.

      • searchProductById

        public BibliographicProduct searchProductById​(java.lang.String productId)
        This Java function searches for a bibliographic product in an inventory by its unique ID and returns it.
        Parameters:
        productId - a String representing the unique identifier of a bibliographic product that needs to be searched in the inventory. The method searches for the product in the inventory list and returns the product object if found, otherwise it returns null.
        Returns:
        The method `searchProductById` returns a `BibliographicProduct` object.

      • deleteProduct

        public void deleteProduct​(BibliographicProduct product)
        This function deletes a bibliographic product from the inventory.
        Parameters:
        product - The parameter "product" is an object of the class "BibliographicProduct" that represents a product in the inventory that needs to be deleted. The method "deleteProduct" takes this object as input and removes it from the inventory.

        public void removeMagazine​(BibliographicProduct product)
